channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.6.5)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.6.5)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # All notable changes to this project are documented in this page. The format is based on Keep a Changelog. 1.6.5 - 2024-01-29 # Changed # AvatarOptimizer now uses ErrorReporting API of NDMF instead of our own API #805 Project is slightly renamed to AAO: Avatar Optimizer #830 The term AAO and Avatar Optimizer are not changed, but display name on the VCC is changed to AAO: Avatar Optimizer Fixed # Fix support for UniVRM components #802 VRM: Fix MergeSkinnedMesh breaking BlendShapeClip / VRM10Expression #810 Unknown component warning were shown multiple time for one type #818 In addition, location of the unknown components are shown on the error report.
